https://tmrev.io/movie/611873-8 Days: To the Moon and Back 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6xlfDChp381UO6SGQryrZbNz6Ni.jpg Join Apollo 11 on its historic journey. The film seamlessly blends mission audio featuring conversations among Neil Armstrong, Buzz Aldrin and Michael Collins with new footage, NASA archive and stunning CGI to recreate the first moon landing. 8 Days: To the Moon and Back
